title: Always D/C during champ select for no reason?
body: For some reason I can easily get in a champ select and this happens like 25% of the time where I join and I get to choose what I want to play but once I need to ban someone I can click the champ but the BAN button isn't red and it clicks me out giving a 5minute dodge queue and loss of LP ??

replies.body: That can happen sometimes if your client loses its connection with the game lobby you were in, which means your client wouldn't have been able to communicate with the others players resulting in you being dropped from the lobby. I would be sure to switch to ethernet and update your DNS settings to see if a smoother connection routing would help first! If you aren't familiar with how to do that, hit up the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some steps.
It literally happens every time look = https://gyazo.com/b4c9142e3464f655b655a394b5c9ff10 | is there any fix or do I just keep receiving losses and 5 minute queues??

Were you able to try the DNS steps and attempting to use an Ethernet cable instead as suggested? Let me know how those steps go and if they're able to help or not, always good to cover the basics to see exactly what's going wrong. 

If those don't help, be sure to send your network logs over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more of a deep dive, but they will likely have you try these steps or a few others first. 

I'd also like to suggest testing this troubleshooting in a custom or practice game, instead of repeatedly queueing up for ranked which could effect you if you keep losing your connection in those lobbies.
